name: Chunks (itch)
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 project. The theme was "Repair".

Browse the cube and look for problems. Click on the problems and press the right key to fix them. Survive as long as you can!

Made within 48 hours, our team of 4 friends had a lot of fun bringing this little game to life. 

It's a short but fun experience best played with sound. Hope you enjoy it :)
